p: Our study also identified the IL-7 signaling pathway as one of suppressed pathways by systemic inflammation. IL-7 is a potent anti-apoptotic cytokine that enhances immune effector cell function and is essential for lymphocyte survival [ 29]. IL-7 has been shown to improve survival in murine models of sepsis [ 30], and lymphocyte functions of septic patients can be restored by ex vivo stimulation with IL-7 [ 31].
